name: Easy Italian Chicken II
author: MARIONROWE
summary: Chicken breasts marinated in Italian-style salad dressing, then baked! It is the easiest and most delicious meal ever and my husband thinks I slave all day to make it!
directions: To Marinate: Pour salad dressing into a large, resealable plastic bag
Add chicken breasts, seal bag and shake to coat
Place in refrigerator for at least 1 hour or overnight (the longer you marinate, the more taste the chicken will absorb)
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Remove chicken from bag, discarding remaining marinade
Place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear
Note: Turn chicken occasionally while baking
